name: UnderSouls: Part 1
description:
A Dark Souls and Undertale FAN GAME !

Combining the best elements of both of these excellent games.

Controls
Keyboard | Xbox 360 Controller
Jump w/ F or Space | A Button
Attack w/ S | X Button
Move w/ Arrow Keys | Left Joystick

This game is pretty short but has 7 different endings depending on what you do.
Windows only for right now.
